title: Got a game with Disco Heat
body:
Hey guys, I was getting a little toxic on the boards lately so I decided to reform and take a break, I guess the Rito gods blessed me by giving me a game with Disco Heat on his stream. I played Ryze JG, and carried his ass gg kappa. If anyone was watching, yes me, Ashe and Fid were all trolling, at 11 at night.

One thing I want to say is: people don't realize what it's like to play with your idol until you do. I was just watching his stream while waiting for a game on my other account, PostVoracity, and I noticed a name "Bobby Orlando" in my lobby. I guess my brain farted because I was switching between his stream and the client, so I probably didn't see the connection for a while. I already locked in Ryze by the time I noticed.

Long story short he looks decent in his videos, but when you play with him you realize just how good he is. Constant prediction hooks, long ranged, sets my boy Ashe up bot lane and overall carries pretty hard, especially with a fed Veigar on their team.

At one point I didn't pick up a lantern under tower because a minion was in the way and it forced me to basic-attack, seriously wtf Riot. Anyway, we won the game pretty quickly and I knew since this is his account for a new Thresh video he wouldn't friend me, but it was worth a shot. Upvoot if yo cri evertim.

So that made my year let alone my day, I honestly feel blessed. He's such a cool guy, and even though he yelled at us a couple times cause he doesn't understand our epic challenjour carrying mechonix, we forgive him. 

Ty Rito.

replies.body: you played well 2 my friend. GG

Are you a regular on the forums?
Or do you just stalk them XD

I cant say i know who he is (i don't take too much notice of pro's and youtubers myself)

But that sounds great man! thats certainly not something that happens every day haha. Im glad it happened to someone who appreciates it so much :)
DH is trash. I would decimate him in a 1v1 with my eyes closed.
He'd probably troll you then put it on youtube
